name: Given Kibanza
bio: Entreprenuer // Dev // Robotics X Space X Medicine

milestones.title: Introduction to programming
milestones.description: I took IT as a subject in high school and so we were introduced to Scratch, the no code platform for making programmes/games. I fell in love with computers/programming eversince and this steered me away from wanting to become a doctor.

milestones.title: Enrolled into BSc Mechatronics
milestones.description: Graduated from high school and now got into uni. Studying Mechatronics at the University of Cape Town in South Africa.

milestones.title: My first Job
milestones.description: I got a job working as a full stack programmer for a client on campus. this was my introduction to web apps and i learned react on the job. The client wasn't aware of this all along :) and i sure did a great job.

milestones.title: Launched my first app - Smart Student
milestones.description: I created an app to help students at my university stay up to date with their assignments/tests. worked on this app for 2 weeks and launched. 30 people signed up that year.

milestones.title: Released Smart Student 2.0
milestones.description: Collaborated with a friend, @cebo_soul on github, and worked to make the app better. which we did. currently near 200 users on campus are using this platform.
